testcase.name: Customer transfers money between deposit accounts

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given My checking account has balance of $2000..............................pending And My saving account has a balance of $3000................................skipped When I transfer $100 from my checking account to Savings account............skipped Then my checking account should have balance of $1900.......................skipped And my saving account should have balance of $3100..........................skipped
